Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
